nodes.bodyText: This fixes a potential null pointer return
Why would this not be R?
Ran out of mnemonic letters, and because of that I prioritized based on use. Repair tab sees more use than this one, so that's why.
ALT+H is the standard mnemonic for a help menu.
Yeah, I know... but I prioritized based on use, and until our help menu is improved it is not a useful one... although I did just realize G is open for hanGar.
